meanings.def: to work together with somebody else in order to achieve something
examples: The two groups agreed to cooperate with each other.
They had cooperated closely in the planning of the project.
The two companies are cooperating in the development of a new engine.
We are cooperating on a research project.

meanings.def: to be helpful by doing what somebody asks you to do
examples: Their captors told them they would be killed unless they cooperated.
The company has agreed to cooperate with the employment survey.
